entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
